NK006(cha)006:0: tan+t+ra r+ai ti na n+da sh+r+ai k+she t+wam s+ya s+aa
NK006(cha)006:1: d+ha na sam b+ai da ru tsi sh+resh+tha sid+d+habi ha
NK006(cha)006:2: ra ti sma //// rgyud lugs 'jam dpal zhi ba'i
NK006(cha)006:3: sgrub thabs ye shes snang ba mchog grub ces bya
NK006(cha)006:4: ra ti sma //// ba bzhugs so // phyogs dus
NK006(cha)006:5: rgyal ba'i ye shes skuh dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma
NK006(cha)006:6: skyes 'jam dpal blo ldan mchog sred rtsal de la
NK006(cha)006:7: gus pas phyag byas nas 'jam dpal sgrub pa'i rim
NK006(cha)006:8: pa ni rnal 'byor lam gyi nyi ma ru grub
NK006(cha)006:9: pa'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis ni bsdebs pa cho ga'i
NK006(cha)006:10: 'gros su spel yang rab blo ldan skal bzang gis
NK006(cha)006:11: dben pa'i gnas su man+dala bcas tshon nam ras bris
NK006(cha)006:12: tshom bu 'god gtor ma sman rag mchod tshogs bshams
NK006(cha)006:13: bde ba'i stan la 'khod byas nas sbyor dngos rjes
NK006(cha)006:14: kyis nyams su blang thog mar mdun du skyabs yul
NK006(cha)006:15: gsal de la skyabs su 'gro ba ni nam mkha'i
NK006(cha)006:16: gnas su nam mkha' gang ba yi bla ma yi
NK006(cha)006:17: dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dang sangs rgyas chos dang
NK006(cha)006:18: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bdag dang 'gro drug gus
NK006(cha)006:19: pas skyabs su mchi lan gsum brjod rjes sems bskyed
NK006(cha)006:20: ra ti sma //// ba bzhugs so // pa //
NK006(cha)006:21: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams ye nas sangs
NK006(cha)006:22: rgyas yin pa la yin par shes pa'i bdag nyid
NK006(cha)006:23: du byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do de nas
NK006(cha)006:25: sems can thams cad rdo rje sdom pas rjes su sdom par gyur cig /
NK006(cha)006:26: sems can thams cad rdo rje chags pas rjes su chags par gyur cig /
NK006(cha)006:27: sems can thams cad rdo rje bde ba chen pos yang dag par myos par gyur cig /
NK006(cha)006:28: sems can thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor pas rjes su grol bar gyur cig /
NK006(cha)006:29: de nas tshogs bsags bya ba ni //
NK006(cha)006:30: hoh rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal //
NK006(cha)006:32: bsdus te byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK006(cha)006:33: sgrub pa sogs kyi tshe yin na skabs 'dir rang
NK006(cha)006:34: mtshams kyi lha gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal gyis
NK006(cha)006:35: bgegs gtor bsngo zhing bgegs rnams rgyang ring du bskrad
NK006(cha)006:37: de nas byin chen dbab pa ni //
NK006(cha)006:38: gsang rdzas gu gul bcas pas bdug /
NK006(cha)006:39: dar sna g.yab cing rol mo dkrol //
NK006(cha)006:40: dmigs pa drag tu gzir bzhin du //
NK006(cha)006:42: 'phags mchog thugs rje'i dus la babs khyad par bstan
NK006(cha)006:43: pa'i dus la babs mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la
NK006(cha)006:44: babs byin gyis rlobs pa'i dus la babasah dbang mchog
NK006(cha)006:45: bskur ba'i dus la babs dngos grub stsol ba'i dus
NK006(cha)006:46: la babs mthu chen bdud 'dul bcom ldan 'das byin
NK006(cha)006:47: chen byin phob bcom ldan 'das dbang chen dbang bskur
NK006(cha)006:48: bcom ldan 'das dngos grub mchog stsol bcom ldan 'das
NK006(cha)006:49: ma g.yel thugs rje'i stobs bskyed la bdag cag las
NK006(cha)006:50: 'bras mchis par mdzod a ra pa tsa na d+h+ai
NK006(cha)006:51: e a ra l+li phem dza h'u ha adz+heem badz+ra
NK006(cha)006:52: dz+nya na a be sha ya h'u h'u zhes brjod
NK006(cha)006:54: de nas mchod tshogs byin brlabs ni //
NK006(cha)006:55: h'u bde stong ye shes mchog gi rol pa las
NK006(cha)006:56: gang snang kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin chos
NK006(cha)006:57: kyi dbyings kun yongs su 'gengs pa yi phyi nang
NK006(cha)006:58: gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya mtshor gyur badz+ra ar+g+ham sogs
NK006(cha)006:59: / shab+ha +aahmh'u +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u
NK006(cha)006:60: h+r+aihthah +aahmh'u ma h+aa rak+ta dz+wa la man+dala h'u h+r+aihthah
NK006(cha)006:61: +aahmh'u ma h+aa ba ling+ta te dz+wa ba ling+ta b+ha
NK006(cha)006:62: la b+ha te gu h+ya sa ma ya h'u h+r+aihthah
NK006(cha)006:64: dngos gzhi lha bskyed rim pa ni //
NK006(cha)006:65: ma h+aa shu nya ta sogs /
NK006(cha)006:66: h'uh chos kun 'od gsal stong pa chen po nyid
NK006(cha)006:67: rang bzhin ma bcos chos nyid rnal ma'i ngang rang
NK006(cha)006:68: byung ye shes kun tu rang snang ba mtha' bral
NK006(cha)006:69: ma 'gags snying rje chen po'i gdangs dbyer med yig
NK006(cha)006:70: 'bru bde ba chen po ni d+h+aihyiga dmar ser 'od
NK006(cha)006:71: kyi phung por shar 'od 'phros snang srid kun sbyangs
NK006(cha)006:72: gnyug ma'i ngang mi shig rdo rje srung ba'i 'khor
NK006(cha)006:73: lo'i dbus dngas ma'i sa bon d+h+aihls 'od lnga 'phros
NK006(cha)006:74: rnam dag ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gyi 'byung
NK006(cha)006:75: lnga rim brtsegs rin chen lhun po'i steng ma chags
NK006(cha)006:76: pad+ma 'bar pa'i gdan gyi dbus 'od zer 'dus pas
NK006(cha)006:77: ye shes gzhal yas khang rang bzhin snang stong mtha'
NK006(cha)006:78: dbus rgya khyon bral gsal 'tsher 'od kyi rang bzhin
NK006(cha)006:79: mtshan nyid rdzogs lhun grub bkod pa'i khyad par kun
NK006(cha)006:80: nas mdzes e yam ram sum kem s+pha ra na
NK006(cha)006:81: phata sam ha ra na h'u pad+ma ma d+h+aa la
NK006(cha)006:82: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+ny+aa na pra s+aa da
NK006(cha)006:83: +aa h'u de yi dbus su sna tshogs rin chen
NK006(cha)006:84: khri mi 'jigs seng ge chen po brgyad kyi mdzes
NK006(cha)006:85: 'dab stong chu skyes bzhad pa'i ge sar dabusah thabs
NK006(cha)006:86: shes nyi ma zla ba 'od du 'bar sing h+aa
NK006(cha)006:87: ma h+aa pa la rat+na ta ra h+r+ai pam pad+ma
NK006(cha)006:88: man+da la ma sur+ya man+dala a tsan+d+r+aa man+da la +aah
NK006(cha)006:89: de ltar rten rnams gsal btab nas //
NK006(cha)006:90: brten pa lha nyid bsgom pa ni //
NK006(cha)006:91: h'u rang bzhin lhun grub 'od lnga'i pho brang dbus
NK006(cha)006:92: zla ba'i gdan la d+h+aihyiga yongs gyur las 'jam dpal
NK006(cha)006:93: rdo rje zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa rang byung ye
NK006(cha)006:94: shes zhi ba'i cha lugs can gser gyi mdog can
NK006(cha)006:95: mtshan dpe'i gzi mdangs 'bar dgyes pa'i spyan zung 'khor
NK006(cha)006:96: 'das yongs la gzigs gnag snum dbu skra zur phud
NK006(cha)006:97: lnga dang ldan g.yas kyi dang pos shes rab ral
NK006(cha)006:98: gri phyar g.yon gyi dang pos ut+pala sdong bu'i dbus
NK006(cha)006:99: bstod pa glur blang le'u'i glegs bam bsnams 'og ma
NK006(cha)006:100: gnyis kyis thabs shes mda' gzhu 'dzin dar dang rin
NK006(cha)006:101: chen me tog rgyan gyis spras dran pas zag med
NK006(cha)006:102: bde ster gzhon nu'i gzugs mdzes pa'i zhabs gnyis rdo
NK006(cha)006:103: rje'i skyil dkrung mdzad gnyis med bde ba'i rang 'od
NK006(cha)006:104: dbyangs can ma // cha lugs yab mtshungs phyag gnyis
NK006(cha)006:105: yab la 'khyud pi wam bsgrengs shing bde chen mnyam
NK006(cha)006:106: par sbyor til gyi gang bu phye ba lta bu
NK006(cha)006:107: yi rab 'byams rtsa gsum rgyal ba'i tshogs dbus na
NK006(cha)006:108: sna tshogs 'od zer mu mtha' med par 'phro sku
NK006(cha)006:109: yi ba spu'i khung bu re rer yang ma lus
NK006(cha)006:110: zhing gi bkod pa ston mdzad pa'i snang stong mkha'
NK006(cha)006:111: khyab mkha' yi rdo rje'i sku sgyu ma chu zla
NK006(cha)006:112: 'ja' yi tshul du gsal many+dzu sh+r+ai dz+ny+aa na sa
NK006(cha)006:113: t+wa h'u d+h+aarma de wi d+h+aa tu shwa ri s+t+wam
NK006(cha)006:114: de nas rgyas gdab dbang bskur ni //
NK006(cha)006:115: h'u de ltar gsal ba'i spyi mgrin snying ga ru
NK006(cha)006:116: ma lus bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo
NK006(cha)006:117: rje gsum dngos +aahmh'u gis ni rgyas btab sku gsung
NK006(cha)006:118: thugs kyi rdo rjer gyur rtse lnga rtse gsum rtse
NK006(cha)006:119: gcig pa'i // rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnas gsum bzhag /
NK006(cha)006:120: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa k+aa ya badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa at+ma ko&a ham de bzhin /
NK006(cha)006:122: h'u spyi bor 'bru lnga'i yi ge'i 'od kyis ni
NK006(cha)006:123: rgyal kun spyan drangs rigs lngas dbang bskur zhing ye
NK006(cha)006:124: shes lnga ldan bdud rtsis lus gang nas mi bskyod
NK006(cha)006:125: rigs kyi bdag pos dbur brgyan gyur ma h+aa shu
NK006(cha)006:126: nya ta dz+ny+aa na swa b+h+aa wa at+ma ko&a ham
NK006(cha)006:127: ma h+aa a dar+sha dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa
NK006(cha)006:128: at+ma ko&a ham sa ma ta pra ti bi sha
NK006(cha)006:129: na kri t+ya nush+tha na dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa
NK006(cha)006:130: wa at+ma ko&a ham de nas ye shes spyan drangs
NK006(cha)006:131: pa / gnas gsum yi ge thugs srog 'od zer
NK006(cha)006:132: gyis phyogs dus sras bcas rgyal ba'i mkhyen rab ni
NK006(cha)006:133: bcom ldan 'jam dpal rdo rje'i rnam pa ru mkha'
NK006(cha)006:134: la sprin bzhin mdun mkhar spyan drangs gyur rdo rje
NK006(cha)006:136: yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus nam
NK006(cha)006:137: mkha' bzhin du dam tshig nye bar gnas bde mchog
NK006(cha)006:138: bde bar gshegs pa dgongs su gsol many+dzu sh+r+ai skal
NK006(cha)006:139: bzang dpal khyod bdag rang bzhin spros bral chos nyid
NK006(cha)006:140: pho brang nas rang byung thugs rje'i bdag nyid bcom
NK006(cha)006:141: ldan 'das ma rigs kun rtog mun pa sel ba'i
NK006(cha)006:142: phyir rang byung ye shes spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol
NK006(cha)006:143: rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcas /
NK006(cha)006:144: e h+ya hi b+ha ga wan many+dzu sh+r+ai dz+ny+aa na
NK006(cha)006:145: sat+wa ma h+aa ka ru ni ka dri sh+ya ho
NK006(cha)006:146: sa ma ya hoh sa ma ya s+t+wam badz+ra sa
NK006(cha)006:147: m+aa dza dzahmh'u bam ho de nas bzhugs su gsol
NK006(cha)006:148: ba ni / h'u ye nas dbyings dang ye shes
NK006(cha)006:149: gnyis su med 'khor 'das dbyer med bde ba chen
NK006(cha)006:150: po'i ngang ma rtog blo yi zhen pa dgrol ba'i
NK006(cha)006:151: phyir rang byung ye shes 'pho 'gyur med par bzhugs
NK006(cha)006:152: many+dzu sh+r+ai dz+ny+aa na sarba d+har+m+aa d+h+aa tu ma h+aa
NK006(cha)006:153: su kha h'u a a lha la gus pas phyag
NK006(cha)006:154: ba ni / 'tshal ba / h'u mi gnas ma
NK006(cha)006:155: bcos dag pa chos sku las rang snang ye shes
NK006(cha)006:156: dpal gyi sku gsal te gang la gang 'dul sprul
NK006(cha)006:157: sku'i 'byung gnas mchog 'jam dpal yab yum sku la
NK006(cha)006:158: phyag 'tshal bstod a ti pu ho pra ti tsa
NK006(cha)006:159: ho de nas mchod pa'i rim pa ni /
NK006(cha)006:160: h'u mkha' dbyings klong yangs kun tu bzang mo'i ngang
NK006(cha)006:161: rang 'od rang snang kun bzang rol pa'i sprin phyi
NK006(cha)006:162: nang gsang ba'i mchod sprin ma lus pa gnyis med
NK006(cha)006:163: rang snang ngang la thim par 'bul many+dzu sh+r+ai badz+ra
NK006(cha)006:164: ar+g+ham sogs / shap+da pra ti ts+tsha ho na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta b+h+yo bi shwa sogs /
NK006(cha)006:165: kham s+w+aa h+aa sman gtor rak+ha'i mchod pa ni h'u
NK006(cha)006:166: rang byung gdod nas dag pa'i bcud rigs lnga dam
NK006(cha)006:167: tshig lnga yi dngos ye shes lnga rdzogs sgrub pa'i
NK006(cha)006:168: rdzas rgyud drug sems can kun sgrol ba dug lnga
NK006(cha)006:169: sel ba'i bdud rtsi 'di bla ma yi dam rnams
NK006(cha)006:170: la 'bul sarba pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa hi spro
NK006(cha)006:171: na / chos sku kun bzang longs sku rigs lnga
NK006(cha)006:172: dang sprul sku rigs gsum rigs can dra ma lnga
NK006(cha)006:173: dga' rab sh+r+ai sing ha rgyal po dza rig 'dzin
NK006(cha)006:174: rnam brgyad pad+ma thod phreng rtsal chos rgyal rje 'bangs
NK006(cha)006:175: gter ston brgya rtsa sogs brgyud ldan bka' gter bla
NK006(cha)006:176: ma'i tshogs rnams la rnam dag bdud rtsi'i dam rdzas
NK006(cha)006:177: mnyes mchod 'bul thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos
NK006(cha)006:178: grub stsol sarba pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa hi dug
NK006(cha)006:179: lnga rang grol ye shes lnga yi bdag bcom ldan
NK006(cha)006:180: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dang chos nyid rang
NK006(cha)006:181: byung ye shes dbyer med pas sangs rgyas kun bskyed
NK006(cha)006:182: dbyings phyug yum mchog ma phyogs dus rab 'byams rgyal
NK006(cha)006:183: ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gang 'dul zhi khro'i rnam rol
NK006(cha)006:184: yi dam lhar rnam dag thugs rjes sarba pany+tsa bar
NK006(cha)006:185: chad kun sel thogs med phrin las bdag /
NK006(cha)006:186: gnas gsum dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dang sangs
NK006(cha)006:187: rgyas bstan pa kun nas legs skyongs ba'i ma mgon
NK006(cha)006:188: dam gcan gza' bdud las gshin sogs rdo rje'i chos
NK006(cha)006:189: skyong gnas gzhi gter gyi bdag rgyud gsum srung ma
NK006(cha)006:190: dregs pa'i tshogs kun la rnam dag thugs rjes sarba
NK006(cha)006:191: pany+tsa bdud rtsi'i dngos grub blang ba ni /
NK006(cha)006:192: 'khor 'das bdud rtsi'i dwangs bcud ni 'bru gsum yi
NK006(cha)006:193: ge'i rnam pa ru mtheb srin nyi zla'i gwa'usa blangs
NK006(cha)006:194: rdo rje'i lce yis myong bar bya k+aa ya sid+d+hi
NK006(cha)006:195: wak+ka sid+d+hi +aa tsit+ta sid+d+hi h'u h'uh stong pa chos
NK006(cha)006:196: kyi dbyings kyi gtor gzhong du snang ba thabs kyi
NK006(cha)006:197: rnam rol gtor ma'i tshogs zhen med rang grol 'od
NK006(cha)006:198: lnga'i zer phreng 'khrugs 'dod yon lha mo'i tshogs dang
NK006(cha)006:199: bcas te 'bul ma h+aa ba ling+ta p+au dza kh+aa
NK006(cha)006:200: hi h'u srid gsum chags pa dbyings su bsgral ba'i
NK006(cha)006:201: khrag dmar gsal bde ba chen po'i thig ler 'khyil
NK006(cha)006:202: rba rlabs bskyod cing 'dod yon lha mo 'phro gsang
NK006(cha)006:203: ba'i rdzas mchog rak+ta'i mchod pa bzhes ma h+aa rak+ta
NK006(cha)006:204: kh+aa hi bde chen sbyor mchod pa ni /
NK006(cha)006:205: h'u rang bzhin spros bral chos nyid dag pa las
NK006(cha)006:206: 'gro ba'i mgon du rang byung 'jam dpal dbyangs thugs
NK006(cha)006:207: rje'i bdag nyid ye shes sems dpa' la rang rgyud
NK006(cha)006:208: bcings pa'i bdag 'dzin mtshan ma'i chos bdag med rgyal
NK006(cha)006:209: ba'i zhing du sbyor ba'i phyir rang snang zhen bral
NK006(cha)006:210: 'dod yon lha mos mchod lha skyes bde chen dga'
NK006(cha)006:211: ba'i rol pa las dkar dmar thabs shes 'dres pa'i
NK006(cha)006:212: byang chub sems rnam dag don bcud rdzogs pa'i bdud
NK006(cha)006:213: rtsi sman yab yum dbyer med klong du 'bul lags
NK006(cha)006:214: na gnyis su med pa'i don gyis bzhes nas kyangah
NK006(cha)006:215: mtshan ma'i rnam rtog bag chags zhi bar mdzod ma
NK006(cha)006:216: h+aa su kha bo d+d+hi tsit+ta pany+tsa a mri ta
NK006(cha)006:217: ar+g+ham pra t+ai ts+tsha kha ram kh+aa hi de nas
NK006(cha)006:219: ho rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas na
NK006(cha)006:220: rang byung ye shes chen po'i sku mtshan ldan zhi
NK006(cha)006:221: ba'i cha lugs su bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das 'jam
NK006(cha)006:222: dpal yab yum mkhyen par mdzad cing dgongs su gsol
NK006(cha)006:223: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i mchod pa ye shes
NK006(cha)006:224: rol pa 'dod pa'i yon tan dang bdud rtsi'i chu
NK006(cha)006:225: rgyun du byin gyis brlabs te 'bul na thugs rje
NK006(cha)006:226: chen pos bzhes shing longs spyad du gsol chos thams
NK006(cha)006:227: cad rang byung ye shes yin pa la yin par
NK006(cha)006:228: ma shes pas dngos po la mngon bar zhen te
NK006(cha)006:229: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams chag
NK006(cha)006:230: dang 'gal 'khrul du gyur pa mthol zhing bshags so
NK006(cha)006:231: rang byung ye shes kyi don mchog dang thun mong
NK006(cha)006:232: gis bsdus pa'i dngos grub thams cad dus dang las
NK006(cha)006:233: la rag ma las par da lta nyid du stsal
NK006(cha)006:234: du gsol lo 'du pa'i nad dang bar chad kyi
NK006(cha)006:235: gdon sogs zhi ba dang tshe dang bsod nams ye
NK006(cha)006:236: shes sogs rgyas pa dang sems kyi chos nyid la
NK006(cha)006:237: rang dbang bsgyur te rtog pa'i mtshan ma thams cad
NK006(cha)006:238: dbyings su gzhom du gsol de nas bstod pa bya
NK006(cha)006:239: ba ni // h'u mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod
NK006(cha)006:240: 'dud yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud stong nyid
NK006(cha)006:241: snying po khyod la 'dud sangs rgyas byang chub khyod
NK006(cha)006:242: la 'dud sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud sangs
NK006(cha)006:243: rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud sangs rgyas dgyes pa
NK006(cha)006:244: khyod la 'dud sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud
NK006(cha)006:245: sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud sangs rgyas bzhad
NK006(cha)006:246: la phyag 'tshal 'dud sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la
NK006(cha)006:247: 'dud sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud med pa
NK006(cha)006:248: las byung khyod la 'dud sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod
NK006(cha)006:249: la 'dud nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud ye
NK006(cha)006:250: shes las byung khyod la 'dud sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba
NK006(cha)006:251: khyod la 'dud sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud
NK006(cha)006:252: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud ye shes sku
NK006(cha)006:253: nyid khyod la 'dud de nas bzlas pa bya ba
NK006(cha)006:254: ba ni // ni // thugs kar zla steng d+h+ai
NK006(cha)006:255: yig mthar sngags kyi phreng bas bskor ba las 'od
NK006(cha)006:256: 'phros 'phags mchod 'gro sgrib sbyangs chos kun dbyer med
NK006(cha)006:257: mnyam pa nyid rang byung ye shes gcig gi ngang
NK006(cha)006:258: sku gsung thugs gsum mi phyed pa bde chen sngags
NK006(cha)006:259: kyi sgra gdangs su ma bcos rang shar nyid du
NK006(cha)006:260: gyur zhes pa'i don las ma yengs par //
NK006(cha)006:261: many+dzu sh+r+ai dz+ny+aa na sat+wa h'u mtshan sngags yi ge
NK006(cha)006:262: 'bru dgu pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bsnyen pa'o gnyis
NK006(cha)006:263: pa nye bar bsnyen pa ni badz+ra many+dzu sh+r+ai +aa
NK006(cha)006:264: w+aa g+ai shwa ri mum d+har+m+aa d+h+aa tu sang g+ha
NK006(cha)006:265: dz+ny+aa na gar+b+ha a h+r+ai a i e o am
NK006(cha)006:266: a ra ri la li ye h'u yi ge drug
NK006(cha)006:267: pa rdo rje'i sgra 'jam dbyangs chen po'i sgra che
NK006(cha)006:268: ba sngags 'di stong phrag drug gis ni mtshan ma'i
NK006(cha)006:269: bag chags sgrib pa dag 'od lnga kha dog 'ja'
NK006(cha)006:270: 'od 'byung zhes gsung 'bum phrag gcig tu bzla yang
NK006(cha)006:271: na thugs srog a ru bsgyur ye ge'i rgyal po
NK006(cha)006:272: bzla bar bya de nas bsgrub pa'i snying po ni
NK006(cha)006:273: badz+ra tik+sh+na duhkhats+tshe da pra dz+ny+aa dz+ny+aa na mur+t+ta ye
NK006(cha)006:274: dz+ny+aa na k+aa ya w+aa g+ai shwa ra a ra
NK006(cha)006:275: p+aa tsa na ya te na ma 'jam dpal rigs
NK006(cha)006:276: drug snying po de 'bum phrag gcig tu bzla bar
NK006(cha)006:277: bya de nas sgrub pa chen po'i tshul shin tu
NK006(cha)006:278: gsang ba'i yang snying mchog 'jam dpal sngags kyi rgyal
NK006(cha)006:279: po ni a ra pa tsa na d+h+ai 'bru bdun
NK006(cha)006:280: 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa'i dus su grangs kyi bsnyen
NK006(cha)006:281: pa rdzogs grub pa'i rtags mtshan 'byung bar 'gyur rgyas
NK006(cha)006:282: par sngags kyi las drug sogs sbyar ba man ngag
NK006(cha)006:283: bzhin du shes rjes kyi bya bar tshogs mchod ni
NK006(cha)006:284: man ngag dag gis 'bul gsungs pa zur du shes
NK006(cha)006:285: par bya ba yin thun mthar mchod bstod dngos grub
NK006(cha)006:286: blangs yig brgya bzla zhing bzod par gsol rten la
NK006(cha)006:287: bzhugs sam gshegs gsol bya de nas bsdu ldang rim
NK006(cha)006:288: pa ni h'u h'u h'u zhes brjod pas snod bcud
NK006(cha)006:289: thams cad 'od du zhu nas gzhal yas khang la
NK006(cha)006:290: thim de yab yum gnyis la thim yum yab la
NK006(cha)006:291: thim yab thugs srog la thim thugs srog n+aa dar
NK006(cha)006:292: yal nas mi dmigs pa 'od gsal stong pa chen
NK006(cha)006:293: po'i ngang du mnyam par gzhag phata slar yang 'od
NK006(cha)006:294: gsal gyi ngang nas skad cig gis chu las chu
NK006(cha)006:295: bur rdol ba'i tshul du rang nyid 'jam dpal rdo
NK006(cha)006:296: rje'i sku sgyu ma lta bur lam gyis gsal bar
NK006(cha)006:297: gyur dge bsngo bkra shis brjod pa ni /
NK006(cha)006:298: ho dge ba 'dis mtshon dus gsum legs byas mthus
NK006(cha)006:299: mkha' khyab 'gro ba'i don du bdag nyid kyi rig
NK006(cha)006:300: stong gdod ma'i mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs rang zhal
NK006(cha)006:301: 'jal nas tshe 'dir byang chub shog chos tshul 'dis
NK006(cha)006:302: kyang phyogs kyi tha gru kun rab khyab spobs pa'i
NK006(cha)006:303: gter chen brgyad kyi sgo 'byed cing mchog thun phrin
NK006(cha)006:304: las mtha' dag kun yid bzhin grub pa'i dge mtshan
NK006(cha)006:305: rgyas gyur cig me tog 'thor zhing dbyangs rol bcas
NK006(cha)006:306: / ka dag gdod ma'i dbyings las lhun grub kyi /
NK006(cha)006:307: rnam rol mi 'gag phan bde'i sgyu 'phrul gar cir
NK006(cha)006:308: yang 'char mdzad rtag khyab ye shes sku 'jam dpal
NK006(cha)006:309: kun tu bzang po'i bkra shis shog shes rab dbyings
NK006(cha)006:310: ma yum gyi bkra shis shog 'gyur med rdo rje
NK006(cha)006:311: sku yi bkra shis shog 'gag med tshangs dbyangs gsung
NK006(cha)006:312: gi bkra shis shog mkhyen brtse mi zad thugs kyi
NK006(cha)006:313: bkra shis shog dgos 'dod lhun grub yon tan bkra
NK006(cha)006:314: shis shog gang brtsams thogs med phrin las bkra shis
NK006(cha)006:315: shog phyogs dus kun tu dge ba'i bkra shis shog
NK006(cha)006:316: mchog thun dngos grub grub pa'i bkra shis shog zhes
NK006(cha)006:317: bya'o rab zab rgyud kyi chu gter chen po nas
NK006(cha)006:318: // mkhas grub klu yi dbang po'i man ngag gis //
NK006(cha)006:319: don gnyis phun tshogs sgrub thabs yid bzhin gter //
NK006(cha)006:320: 'di na skal bzang skye rgu'i gnyen du blang //
NK006(cha)006:321: dad pas 'di la zhugs na mchog thun gyi //
NK006(cha)006:322: dngos grub 'grub la som nyi'i skabs bral phyir //
NK006(cha)006:323: 'bad pas tshul 'di gsal por phye ba yi //
NK006(cha)006:324: dge bas 'gro kun 'jam dbyangs nyid gyur cig /
NK006(cha)006:325: ces pa'ang rdo rje 'chang gi sngags rgyud spyi dang
NK006(cha)006:326: khyad par grub pa'i slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal
NK006(cha)006:327: bshes gnyen gyi gsung 'jam dpal zhi sgrub bdud rtsi
NK006(cha)006:328: thigs pa sogs gsang sngags rnying ma'i bka' gter gyi
NK006(cha)006:329: gdams pa zab mo mkha' 'gro'i kha rlangs tho le
NK006(cha)006:330: ba / mu stegs dang rtog ges bsre bslad ma
NK006(cha)006:331: zhugs pa'i rang chos gtsang ma las lag len chog
NK006(cha)006:332: 'grig tu gsal por phye ba 'di ni /
NK006(cha)006:333: gnam lcags sdigs pa'i chos skor tshe bdag sogs gshed
NK006(cha)006:334: skor kyi drag sgrub mang po'i zhi bsnyen du 'gro
NK006(cha)006:335: ba dang / 'jam dpal zhi ba bla med lugs
NK006(cha)006:336: nyid yi dam du 'dzin pa rnams kyi don gnyis
NK006(cha)006:337: yid bzhin 'grub pa'i rgyur dmigs nas dad pa dang
NK006(cha)006:338: blo gros yang dag pa'i 'jug pas 'jam dpal rdo
NK006(cha)006:339: rje'i rigs sngags 'dzin pa zil gnon dgyes pa rtsal
NK006(cha)006:340: ba dang / zhes bya bas / 7 khyab bdag
NK006(cha)006:341: rig 'dzin bla ma'i nye char rang gnas kyi khang
NK006(cha)006:342: bur rab tshes lcags sbrul cho 'phrul zla ba'i nya
NK006(cha)006:343: la grub par bgyis shing dge mtshan gyi rten 'brel
NK006(cha)006:344: rab tu gyur pa lags so //
NK006(cha)006:345: dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro'i snying khrag dwangs ma lta bu'i
NK006(cha)006:346: chos sde shin tu gsal por bstan pa yin pas
NK006(cha)006:347: gsangs shing gces spras su bya'o //
NK006(cha)006:348: bka' srung rnams kyis bya ra gyis /
